description:
The problem with most blogs is that they are not started with the right mindset. And that is why most blogs (about 95% of those that are started!) are abandoned.

Most bloggers start a blog not knowing why they start it for. Or they have wrong notions about blogging and business.

How bad is this problem? You start a blog with a dream. You have wrong notions. Your dream is not a realistic one.

You put all the effort you can to build this blog hoping it will make your dream come true. But as time passes, you find yourself in a position similar to working out on a treadmill.

You exert so much energy and do the walking, but you go nowhere. You are in the same place – and even worse – now you are so tired, hopeless, discouraged and want to quit, without making any progress.

See? This is how things go if you start a blog with the wrong mindset.

Your blog is just the backbone of your business and without it your business will not prosper

Your blog is the one that promotes your business, that acts as the funnel to attract prospects and customers to your business and helps build your brand and authority online.

With the right kind of blogging, your business will thrive.

The success of your blog is very crucial for the success of your business. And this course will help you build a blog that will actually serve the purpose. To be precise –

This course will lay the perfect foundation for you to build a blog that will build your business 24×7.

You will find that this course will hold your hand and walk you through the right path to blogging success.
title: How to start a blog with the RIGHT foundation and succeed?
